data.title: Transatlantic middle-market private equity
data.meta_description: Rhône is a transatlantic middle-market private equity firm investing in high quality businesses with significant value creation opportunities.
data.text:
Our cohesive team of tenured and experienced investment professionals is positioned on both sides of the Atlantic. Our international presence and united company culture position us to discreetly capitalize on opportunities that are less accessible by regionally focused middle-market private equity firms.

We have a disciplined investment strategy specializing in carve-out acquisitions and partnerships with founding families, across the industrial and consumer sectors.
